settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: A Delicious Dinner for Two: At Table & Twine, we believe that good food is key to creating special moments with those you love most. Your Valentine’s Day meal kit comes complete with seasonal ingredients for a fresh and delicious dinner. Even better, the dishes are designed by experienced chefs who are passionate about flavor.

Restaurant-Quality Food from Your Kitchen: For Valentine’s Day, many couples want to spend time together over good food without the price tag of an expensive restaurant. Luckily, Table & Twine makes this possible for you and your valentine. We prepare and source food from our state-of-the-art kitchen to make your dinner cost-effective and delicious.

Convenient Meal Preparation: With Table & Twine, a sophisticated Valentine’s Day dinner doesn’t need hours to prepare. Enjoy less prep work, cooking, and cleaning while you spend time with your partner over a special meal. We aim to make your catered meal as convenient as possible to give you quality time together.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Valentine’s Day Dinner at Home
settings.text2: We are committed to creating high-quality meals for couples to cook and share together. Order our Valentine’s Day meal kit today to enjoy a variety of benefits including:

settings.title: How Much Time Is Required to Prepare the Food in My Valentine’s Day Dinner Package?
settings.text: Set aside one to two hours with your date to prepare the food in your Valentine’s Day meal kit. Afterwards, enjoy quality time together knowing that you have minimal cleanup ahead.

settings.title: How Far in Advance Do I Need to Order My Valentine’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: Be sure to order your meal kit by February 7th to get it in time for Valentine’s Day. Feel free to place an order before then to impress your date.

settings.title: Can I Customize My Valentine’s Day Meal Kit?
settings.text: No, the Valentine’s Day meal kit cannot be customized. Our experienced chefs intentionally limit the menu to provide the best combination of flavors for your romantic dinner.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
